body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Sweet Treats Bakery Customer Support. My name is Bobby Roberts. How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Bobby, my name is Karen Perez. I'm having an issue with the quality of the product I received.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I’m sorry to hear that, Karen. Could you please provide me with the order number so I can look into this for you?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Certainly. The order number is five six seven eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Karen. Could you also tell me the name of the product and briefly describe the issue you encountered?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I ordered a dozen chocolate chip cookies, but they were burnt and hard.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm really sorry to hear that, Karen. I understand how disappointing that must be. Can you also tell me the date the order was delivered?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: The order was delivered on October fifth.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Karen. We will certainly look into this matter to resolve it as quickly as possible.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your patience and understanding, Karen. We value your feedback and will do our best to make it right. Have a great day!
